bookinfo.title: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor User Guide

abstract.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor (RA) is the JAIN SLEE 1.1 RA for the SIP Protocol, used in &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE platform.
The RA implements the Resource Adaptor Type defined by Appendix D of the JAIN SLEE 1.1 Specification, and provides high performance and fail over support.
